about:
I am a web developer and a final-year Computer Science student at IIIT Kota. I have a strong passion for designing efficient, user-friendly interfaces and building seamless user experiences. My interests extend beyond front-end and back-end development, as I'm also exploring emerging technologies like machine learning and Web3.
As an active member of IIIT Kota's Artive and Codebase clubs, I've had the opportunity to collaborate on creative and technical projects, enhancing both my development and problem-solving skills. I am also a core team member of the college volleyball team and have participated in several tournaments, where I've learned valuable lessons in teamwork and discipline.
With my combined interest in technology and sports, I aim to create impactful digital solutions while continuously growing and exploring new advancements
